result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: d'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: d'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana

result.ponchtml: d'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.eng: The work will take six months.
result.html: glacfaidh an obair sé mhíThe work will take six months.
result.ponchtml: glacfaiḋ an obair sé ṁíThe work will take six months.

result.eng: It will take at least six years.

result.html: tá seisear clainne agamI have six children.

result.eng: He is six years of age.

result.ponchtml: tá sé sé bliana d'aoisHe is six years of age.

result.eng: Pól is six years old and Nuala has two years.
result.ga: tá pól sé bliana d'aois agus tá dhá bhliain ag nuala
result.orig: tá pól sé bliana d'aois agus tá dhá bhliain ag nuala

result.eng: I usually wake at six o'clock.

result.eng: [Looking at a family photo:] Let me see - six boys and four girls. Am I right?

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
